name: House Of Desire
description:
Our submission to Ludum Dare 51: Every 10 Seconds. Lulu, a shy girl is challenged to acquire a medallion from a spooky house... But the house may not be entirely as it seems.

Switching rapidly between challenging Jump and Run and dialogues with quirky characters, we tried our hand at a game split in two, with both halves linking into each other and coming together to tell an intriguing story.

Feedback and criticism is always appreciated!

Music by: https://soundcloud.com/prod-by-kire
